custom_collection.body_html: Bharti Prajapati graduated in Textiles from the National Institute of Design (NID), Ahmadabad. She is greatly inspired by folk art and the people of Kutch, with their ethnic style and vivid hues of textiles. She took to painting and created her own style and imagery of folk people, ethnicity and design in costumes and intricate adornments in her paintings.
custom_collection.title: artist_Bharti_Prajapati
